main.bio: Passionate about Architecture, Security, UI/UX, and the ever-evolving world of technology. Embracing the #LifeLongLearning mindset, I specialize in Web, Cloud, and scripting applications, following a DevOps & Full Stack approach. Deeply engaged in Blockchain, AI, and Machine Learning, I integrate architectural vision with cutting-edge innovation
main.big-bio: My name is Paolo, born in '88, and since 2018, I've been part of the dynamic world of Accenture. Throughout my career, I've immersed myself in a plethora of projects, languages, architectures, and roles, each shaping me into the versatile and forward-thinking innovator I am today. My journey in tech has not only been about adapting and learning; it's been a process of constant innovation and redefinition of what's possible. An essential daily habit that has been crucial to my success is my walking meditation. Every day, without fail, this practice helps me maintain calmness and focus, allowing me to approach challenges with clarity and innovate with intention. It's in these moments of tranquility that I find my greatest inspirations and the strength to keep pushing the boundaries of technology. My most precious childhood memory is of visiting the animals with my grandmother during vacations. Those moments, filled with dedication, effort, and love towards the creatures that depended so much on us, taught me valuable lessons early on. Experiencing the responsibility as a playful adventure instilled in me a profound respect for life and nature, values that I carry with me in everything I do. There's a place that I consider my 'second home'‚Äîa small balcony in an inaccessible house in a hamlet in the Val Maira. This secluded spot is where I find peace, inspiration, and a sense of timelessness that rejuvenates my soul. Here, I reconnect with myself, drawing inspiration from the serene landscape to fuel my passion for innovation and creativity. In my role at Accenture, I bring this blend of calm determination, inspired innovation, and deep-rooted values to every project I tackle. I am constantly on the lookout for the next challenge, ready to leverage my experiences and insights to make a meaningful impact in the tech world.
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

cv.cvPersonalStatement: I am a result-driven, motivated, and versatile developer with a proven ability to work with Agile and DevOps framework; and I follow the full-stack approach. I keep studying and learning to enhance my Architectural skills with a strong focus on the Cloud environment. Seeking to combine learning growth and work experience in a challenging role. Available to relocate & Available to travel.

work.title: ROS developer - Parrot Drone surface check project
work.description:
Lead and manage development teams for critical projects, including the EUDR Regulation Compliance project, ensuring timely and quality delivery.

Deploy custom blockchain networks with Hyperledger Besu, develop Solidity smart contracts for NFT management, and create backend services in Node.js and Quarkus for blockchain and data interactions.

Develop user interfaces with React and Next.js, integrating seamlessly with enterprise systems (SAP, TIBCO) and AWS for secure and efficient data handling.

Responsible for DevOps practices, using Docker, Docker Compose, and Kubernetes for container management and orchestration, and managing CI/CD pipelines with Bamboo.

Oversee AWS environment configurations (IAM, EC2, EKS) to optimize cloud-native applications, while applying cryptographic techniques for security and data integrity.

Collaborate with business departments and clients to define requirements, design solutions, and implement Agile methodologies as a *certified* Scrum Developer.

Document processes, release notes, and technical guides in Confluence for knowledge sharing and continuity.

senior developer.definition: This figure creates the application components (programs) and the necessary data structures as defined by the technical specifications. He/she carries out unit tests of the modules developed and deals with aspects related to deployment/release management in production. He/she collaborates with the project team in preparing the systems and performance tests and he supports the preparation and execution of integration tests.
senior developer.mainResponsabilities: Guide the software quality and performance, Develop or modify the necessary application components and data structures as defined by the architecture shared with the system architect in accordance with the operability criteria, Create the development modules that interface with the DMS products using the appropriate development tool kits, all graphic objects (images, icons, buttons, effects, etc.), page layouts (texts, background, borders, etc.), animations, etc.‚Ä¢ Produce or modify components for the automation of unit testing, in accordance with the methodologies intended to be used, Support the Analysts with functional analysis work on an occasional basis, Collaborate with the Analysts in designing the system and performance tests and support the preparation and execution of integration tests‚Ä¢ Test the individual programs and participate in the testing of the respective procedures, Prepare or modify the ‚Äústoryboard‚Äù for the presentation and browsing procedures, Manage anomalies found during functional testing/user testing/operational support, and direct the resolution of the problem by the development or maintenance group, Store and update all information (sources, tests, documents) relating to the life-cycle of the applications within Enel systems, Draw up and update the program documentation, Collaborate, if required, in defining and documenting the system architectures, Deals with any aspect related to the deploy/release management in production.
senior developer.specificSkills: Knowledge of the required environments, languages and development and programming tools. In-depth knowledge of the required programming language and the respective analysis, design, programming and testing techniques, General knowledge of the required architectures, DBMS and operational environments. , Knowledge of the techniques for the execution and implementation of unit and system tests., Knowledge of the functional aspect on the pertaining module., Knowledge of the Agile methodology. , Problem determination skills, Ability to optimize the code to minimize resource usage , Ability to write technical documentation and user manuals When the resource is involved in activity carried out in Agile, the following skills are requested: Do all necessary work to achieve the objectives of the sprint and the project release in accordance with the Vision and Done Set: Collaborate with the Product Owner to keep the Backlog up to date and with the right degree of detail, Estimate ‚ÄúUser Stories‚Äù and other activities in the Backlog, Carry out analysis and design (including UX and architecture), Develop or customize the products within the scope, Develop tests within the scope (Unit, Integration, Performance, Function and Non-Functional)., Design testing cards, Develop test automation, Carry out automated and manual tests to ensure product quality, Document the solution‚Äôs life cycle in accordance with Enel standards

Design & Build.ita: Design-build √® un sistema di consegna del progetto utilizzato nel settore delle costruzioni. √à un metodo per fornire un progetto in cui i servizi di progettazione e costruzione sono contratti da una singola entit√† nota come progettista o costruttore
Design & Build.Traditional Project Delivery: The Owner must manage two separate contracts which all-too-often creates an adversarial relationship between the designer and the contractor. If something goes wrong or an unforeseen circumstance requires changes, the designer and contractor blame one another for the cost overruns or schedule changes, often leading to litigation and delays which add to the project cost.
Design & Build.Design-Build Project Delivery: The Owner manages only one contract with a single point of responsibility. The designer and contractor work together from the beginning, as a team, providing unified project recommendations to fit the Owner's schedule and budget. Any changes are addressed by the entire team, leading to collaborative problem-solving and innovation, not excuses or blame-shifting. While single-source contracting is the fundamental difference between design-build and the old ways, equally important is the culture of collaboration inherent in design-build.

Build Management.what: With the move to continuous integration and continuous delivery, build management has become an important part of the software development and testing lifecycle. Build management is the process of collecting all of the assets to be included in a software release, performing all the automated tasks to compile, build and test the system and then deploy onto the development and testing environments in preparation for staging.

SpringBoot.ita: Spring Boot √® il framework per creare applicazioni basate sul framework Java Spring che sono subito pronte per ambienti di produzione e sono maggiormente utilizzate per creare microservizi
SpringBoot.eng: Spring Boot is an open source Java-based framework used to create a micro Service. It helps you to create Spring-powered, production-grade applications and services with absolute minimum fuss

J2EE.ita: La piattaforma Java‚Ñ¢ 2, Enterprise Edition (J2EE) fornisce uno standard per lo sviluppo di applicazioni enterprise a pi√π livelli
J2EE.eng: J2EE stands for Java 2 Platform, Enterprise Edition. J2EE is the standard platform for developing applications in the enterprise and is designed for enterprise applications that run on servers. J2EE provides APIs that let developers create workflows and make use of resources such as databases or web services. J2EE consists of a set of APIs. Developers can use these APIs to build applications for business computing.

Angular.ita: Angular 2+ (o semplicemente Angular) √® un framework open source per lo sviluppo di applicazioni web con licenza MIT, evoluzione di AngularJS. Sviluppato principalmente da Google, la sua prima release √® avvenuta il 14 settembre 2016. Angular √® un framework per la realizzazione di interfacce utente, moderno, veloce, robusto e flessibile
Angular.eng: Angular is a platform for building mobile and desktop web applications. Angular is an open-source, JavaScript framework written in TypeScript. Google maintains it, and its primary purpose is to develop single-page applications

Atlassian.ita: Atlassian Corporation Plc √® una compagnia di software enterprise che sviluppa prodotti per sviluppatori di software, project management e per la gestione dei contenuti. √à nota soprattutto per la sua applicazione di tracciamento delle segnalazioni, Jira, e per l'applicazione wiki e collaborativa Confluence
Atlassian.eng: Atlassian Corporation is an Australian software development company for the IT industry. It is best known for its JIRA and Confluence bug tracking system. The company is headquartered in Seattle, USA. In total, the company has nine offices in six countries and serves more than 100,000 customers

MySQL.ita: MySQL o Oracle MySQL √® un relational database management system (RDBMS) composto da un client a riga di comando e un server. Entrambi sono multipiattaforma[2] e sono disponibi ufficialmente su praticamente tutte le distribuzioni conosciute, come Debian, Ubuntu e CentOS[3], sebbene lo abbiano sostanzialmente sostituito con MariaDB a partire dal 2012.
MySQL.eng: MySQL is a database system used by many websites on the Internet. It is based on SQL. Many ways of doing things in SQL are similar in MySQL. The data is structured in tables in MySQL. And to extract data from the tables queries are used.For example: SELECT id_number FROM main_database WHERE name='John',This query will return the 'id_number' of the person named 'John' from the table named 'main_database'.

Oracle SQL Developer.ita: Oracle SQL Developer √® un ambiente di sviluppo integrato per lavorare con SQL nei database Oracle. Oracle Corporation fornisce questo prodotto gratuitamente; utilizza il Java Development Kit
Oracle SQL Developer.eng: Oracle SQL Developer is an Integrated development environment (IDE) for working with SQL in Oracle databases. Oracle Corporation provides this product free; it uses the Java Development Kit.

Oracle Database.ita: Oracle Database √® uno tra i pi√π famosi software di database management system sviluppato da Oracle Corporation. Scritto in linguaggio C, che fa parte dei cosiddetti RDBMS ovvero di sistemi di database basati sul modello relazionale affermatosi come standard di riferimento dei database dell'ultimo decennio
Oracle Database.eng: Oracle Database (commonly referred to as Oracle DBMS, Oracle Autonomous Database, or simply as Oracle) is a multi-model[4] database management system produced and marketed by Oracle Corporation. It is a database commonly used for running online transaction processing (OLTP), data warehousing (DW) and mixed (OLTP & DW) database workloads

MySql vs Oracle DB.eng: MySQL and Oracle SQL are both RDBMSs (relational database management systems) owned by Oracle Corporation. MySQL is built to be primarily free and open-source, while Oracle is primarily built to be commercial and paid. MySQL is also more customizable than Oracle which is because Oracle is a finished product

TypeScript.ita: TypeScript √® un linguaggio di programmazione open source sviluppato da Microsoft. Si tratta di un'estensione di JavaScript che basa le sue caratteristiche su ECMAScript 6
TypeScript.eng: TypeScript is JavaScript with syntax for types. TypeScript is a strongly typed programming language that builds on JavaScript, giving you better tooling at any scale

Full Stack.ita: Il full stack developer √® un programmatore che conosce tutti gli aspetti della programmazione, sia frontend che backend
Full Stack.eng: Full stack technology refers to the entire depth of a computer system application, and full stack developers straddle two separate web development domains: the front end and the back end. The front end includes everything that a client, or site viewer, can see and interact with

Docker.ita: Docker √® un popolare software libero progettato per eseguire processi informatici in ambienti isolabili, minimali e facilmente distribuibili chiamati container Linux, con l'obiettivo di semplificare i processi di deployment di applicazioni software
Docker.eng: Docker is an open source containerization platform. It enables developers to package applications into containers‚Äîstandardized executable components combining application source code with the operating system (OS) libraries and dependencies required to run that code in any environment

certifications.title: Certified Kubernetes Application Developer (CKAD)
description: Earners of this certification have demonstrated the ability to design, build, and deploy cloud-native applications for Kubernetes.

certifications.title: AWS Certified Solutions Architect Associate
description: Earners of this certification have a comprehensive understanding of AWS services and technologies. They demonstrated the ability to build secure and robust solutions using architectural design principles based on customer requirements. Badge owners are able to strategically design well-architected distributed systems that are scalable, resilient, efficient, and fault-tolerant.

certifications.title: DevOps Foundation
description: The DevOps Foundation course provides a baseline understanding of key DevOps terminology and the fundamental principles and frameworks that underpin it.

certifications.title: Trained Accenture Master Technology Architect (Fundamentals)
description: The MTA certification program specifies the skills and experiences expected of Technology Architects. It is designed for Accenture technology professionals in order to: evaluate and progress with the technology skills, enable technology professionals to perform in the NEW, recognize technology architecture skills, offer a well-defined career progression for aspiring architects.

certifications.title: AWS Certified Cloud Practitioner
description: Earners of this certification have a fundamental understanding of IT services and their uses in the AWS Cloud. They demonstrated cloud fluency and foundational AWS knowledge. Badge owners are able to identify essential AWS services necessary to set up AWS-focused projects.

certifications.title: Professional Scrum Master‚Ñ¢ Certification
description: The Professional Scrum Master (PSM I) is recognized by the industry as a certification that demonstrates a fundamental level of Scrum mastery.

certifications.title: Microsoft Azure Fundamentals [AZ900]
description: Earners of this certification have demonstrated foundational level knowledge of cloud services and how those services are provided with Microsoft Azure.
